text:
Paul Christopher Neville (20 March 1940 – 1 January 2019) was an Australian politician. He was a member of the National Party. Neville was a member of the Australian House of Representatives from March 1993 to August 2013, representing the Division of Hinkler, Queensland.
Neville died at a hospital in Bundaberg, Queensland on 1 January 2019 at the age of 78.
